bio:
Amsterdam-based Senior Experience Designer with 7+ years of experience working with agencies, cultural organizations, and brands.

Specializing in digital and spatial experiences and innovating services in retail, I can oversee the entire design process from discovery to delivery.

My particular interest lies in exploring the interaction between people and technology beyond traditional devices, seamlessly integrating digital elements into physical spaces. Currently at Random Studio, previously at Strelka Institute, and Marka.
